rows.label: qst712001_msg0001
rows.name:
Just as I thought... I
knew you all would come.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0002
rows.name:
As I said before, my Driver and I
are looking for skilled people to
take on a certain dangerous mission.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0003
rows.name:
So this time, I'll have you
take a slightly more difficult
test than last time.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0005
rows.name:
I'd like you to perform
a Blade Combo up to the
third stage, 5 times...

rows.label: qst712001_msg0006
rows.name:
As I said last time, a Blade Combo is a
combination of Specials, and the basic method
for the third stage is the same as the second.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0007
rows.name:
If you activate Specials in the order of level
I, level II or higher, and level III or higher,
a third-stage Blade Combo will occur.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0008
rows.name:
Also, for those of you who cleared
the last test, I must tell you
about the "critical route."

rows.label: qst712001_msg0009
rows.name:
A critical route is a Blade Combo that
deals higher than normal damage when you
use a Special of a specific element.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0010
rows.name:
As far as I know, a critical route is
activated when you use Specials in the
order of "Fire" > "Fire" > "Light."

rows.label: qst712001_msg0011
rows.name:
But there are many more critical
routes, so it might be a good idea
to look for them on this test.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0012
rows.name:
Note that whether you activate a critical
route or not will not be part of the
evaluation for this test, so don't worry.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0013
rows.name:
Of course, any pattern of Blade
Combo will count as one as long as
you connect it to the third stage.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0014
rows.name:
Also, as before, the location and target
don't matter. Feel free to practice it in
a place and against an opponent you like.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0015
rows.name:
This time too, no matter where
you are, I will perceive your
movements with my ability.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0016
rows.name:
Well then, I will be
waiting with anticipation.
